title: RevFoundry Intake
description: Launch or scale your startup with The Revenue Scientists. Get revenue systems, CRM setup, and growth infrastructure in 90 days.

sections.title: Basic Info
sections.description: Let's start with your contact information

sections.title: Idea Snapshot
sections.description: Help us understand your product or service

fields.label: Describe your product or service in one sentence
fields.placeholder: We help small businesses automate their invoicing and get paid faster

fields.label: What problem does it solve?
fields.placeholder: Describe the specific pain point your product addresses...

fields.label: Who is your ideal customer?
fields.placeholder: Be specific: industry, company size, role, location, budget, etc.

fields.label: How do you plan to deliver it?

options.label: Digital (SaaS, software, online service)
Physical (product, retail, hardware)
Hybrid (combination of digital and physical)
Service-based (consulting, agency, professional services)

sections.title: Current Stage
sections.description: Where are you in your journey?

options.label: Idea Only — Concept stage, no product built yet
Prototype / MVP — Built something, testing with early users
Already Selling — Making sales, but inconsistent
Generating Consistent Revenue — Predictable sales, ready to scale
Solo founder
2-3 people
4-5 people
6-10 people
10+ people

sections.title: Goals & Outcomes
sections.description: What does success look like for you?

fields.label: Desired outcome in 90 days
fields.placeholder: Example: Launch MVP and get first 10 paying customers, or Scale from $5K to $15K MRR with systems in place

fields.label: Target Monthly Revenue (90 days from now)
Biggest challenge right now
fields.placeholder: What's blocking your growth? Be specific about obstacles, gaps, or bottlenecks...

fields.label: What have you tried so far?
fields.placeholder: Any tools, strategies, or approaches you've tested? What worked or didn't work?

sections.title: Systems & Data
sections.description: What tools and data are you working with?

fields.label: Do you currently use any CRM, ad platforms, or analytics tools?
fields.placeholder: Examples: HubSpot, Salesforce, Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, Mailchimp, etc.

fields.label: Can you provide access or links to relevant data?
fields.placeholder: Share links to dashboards, reports, or indicate if you can grant access to tools. Not required but helps us understand your current state.

options.label: Non-technical — Need full setup and training
Somewhat technical — Can learn new tools with guidance
Very technical — Comfortable with SaaS and automation

sections.title: Engagement Preference
sections.description: How would you like to work with us?

options.label: Cash Build — $15K upfront, 90-day sprint to build revenue systems
Equity Advisory — 3-5% equity, ongoing strategic guidance and execution
RevAdvance Financing — We fund your growth, you pay back from future revenue
Not sure yet — Want to discuss options

fields.label: When do you want to start?

options.label: Immediately — Ready to start within 1-2 weeks
This month — Ready within 2-4 weeks
Next month — Planning ahead
Just exploring — Gathering information

fields.label: Anything else we should know?
fields.placeholder: Additional context, questions, or specific needs...
